choose.when: UPDATE TB_SHOPPING_CART set ITEM_NUMBER = #{itemNumber} WHERE USER_TOKEN = #{userToken} AND ITEM_ID = #{itemId}
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO TB_SHOPPING_CART(ID, USER_TOKEN, ITEM_ID, ITEM_NUMBER) VALUES((SELECT replace(uuid(), '-', '') from dual), #{userToken}, #{itemId}, #{itemNumber})
